url.title: URL
url.description: The URL path to access the file which should be replicated.

format.title: File Format
format.description: The Format of the file which should be replicated (Warning: some formats may be experimental, please refer to the docs).

service_account_json.title: Service Account JSON
service_account_json.description: In order to access private Buckets stored on Google Cloud, this connector would need a service account json credentials with the proper permissions as described here. Please generate the credentials.json file and copy/paste its content to this field (expecting JSON formats). If accessing publicly available data, this field is not necessary.

aws_access_key_id.title: AWS Access Key ID
aws_access_key_id.description: In order to access private Buckets stored on AWS S3, this connector would need credentials with the proper permissions. If accessing publicly available data, this field is not necessary.

aws_secret_access_key.title: AWS Secret Access Key
aws_secret_access_key.description: In order to access private Buckets stored on AWS S3, this connector would need credentials with the proper permissions. If accessing publicly available data, this field is not necessary.

sas_token.title: SAS Token
sas_token.description: To access Azure Blob Storage, this connector would need credentials with the proper permissions. One option is a SAS (Shared Access Signature) token. If accessing publicly available data, this field is not necessary.

shared_key.title: Shared Key
shared_key.description: To access Azure Blob Storage, this connector would need credentials with the proper permissions. One option is a storage account shared key (aka account key or access key). If accessing publicly available data, this field is not necessary.

storage_account.title: Storage Account
storage_account.description: The globally unique name of the storage account that the desired blob sits within. See here for more details.

storage.title: Storage
storage.description: WARNING: Note that the local storage URL available for reading must start with the local mount "/local/" at the moment until we implement more advanced docker mounting options.

provider.title: Storage Provider
provider.description: The storage Provider or Location of the file(s) which should be replicated.

dataset_name.title: Dataset Name
dataset_name.description: The Name of the final table to replicate this file into (should include letters, numbers dash and underscores only).

reader_options.title: Reader Options
reader_options.description: This should be a string in JSON format. It depends on the chosen file format to provide additional options and tune its behavior.
